extendedInfo.description: The most feature complete northern lights app for Android!UPDATING BUG IS NOW FIXED.This app gives you updates and alerts for the short-term Aurora Borealis (and Aurora Australis) forecast from the University of Alaska Fairbanks Geophysical Institute. Great for knowing when to get outside to see the northern lights.You can also view the most recent satellite data for both the North and South poles, as well as the most recent short term predictions on a map for 5 areas:AlaskaNorth AmericaEuropeNorth PolarSouth Polar(Do a long press on the image to select.)Ideas and requests for features which you would like to see in the app should be either emailed to me, or left in the comments. Thanks!

reviews.title: Working great
reviews.comment: Great app - works great now that update bug fixed!  Weather no longer working.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a pretty slick, very streamlined app with all of the basic functionality of NOAA\'s POES satellite web page. The alert function however, seems a bit sporadic.
reviews.author: Tony Collins

reviews.title: Wait for higher rating
reviews.comment: Kp does not update.  Has had Kp at 3.0 from USAF for 3 days now.  Sat image from NOAA POES is updating correctly.  Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: if it worked it would be great - it does not!
reviews.comment: Its so sad that an app with so much potential fails so badly - once again this has crashed and still shows the data from several days ago ........ it seems that everytime there is any activity then aurora buddy dies - which makes the whole thing pretty pointless  But what really amazes me is that the advert for the pro version is still there ...... how on earth do you think anyone would even consider paying all that money for a more complicated version when the basic one is so useless?? I really want an aur
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as intended
reviews.comment: Very cool, lightweight app and works great. I\'m still having issues where the app won\'t notify me unless I physically open the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I would buy the pro version but there are some negative reviews of that one. I would like some of those features but want them to work. This one is basic but works great.  Haven\'t missed an opportunity to photo the aurora since downloading.
reviews.author: Kent Carder

reviews.title: Unable to install on Droid 2
reviews.comment: App will download but I get Installation Failed error. Tried rebooting but no help.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SGS2 ICS
reviews.comment: Excellent app. I wouldn\'t hesitate to get the paid app if it was \342\202\2541.49
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: This app puts ads in your status bar. No thanks.
reviews.author: Gerald EST

reviews.title: great until recently
reviews.comment: Will not open it keeps having to force close
reviews.author: Brandon Neemann

reviews.comment: Awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh..
reviews.comment: Would purchase full version if it wasn\'t $8!!! That\'s alot for an app, that is supposed to be the upgrade of this one. According to reviews, \"it doesn\'t seem that great!\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun and easy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: free version  too little info
reviews.comment: too little useful info in free version. worse than simply search online.
reviews.author: Colin Zhang

reviews.title: Good as a free app. Don\'t buy!
reviews.comment: Saw the best show of lights ever... thanks. But all I this information/images and more are being taken from a website. swpc.noaa.gov. So really not worth paying for! Except for the automated notification - nothing new here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine
reviews.comment: I would love to go pro but almost capped my pants when I saw it was $8. Way way way over priced. I think I will stay free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Most of the time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Turns off
reviews.comment: Does not stay running so you must chexk it on your own
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app, but update issue
reviews.comment: Best app out there, was able to see the Aurora for the first time.. However since the new update, I was not alerted to the auroral activity last night
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Downloaded this instead of Pro
reviews.comment: I downloaded the pro version first, but refunded it because of:  The Pro: Could not get location: (Yes, my GPS is on) The Pro: Could not get weather update (can not remember exact, but it was something like that) (Yes, I have internet access)  So I refunded it and downloaded this app instead. I have kept the pro if it had worked.  My 5 star rating is for this app with less features, but at least it works as announced :)
reviews.author: A Google User
